description.value:
Requirements You and an adjacent creature are both on a narrow surface or uneven ground and the other creature is off-guard.

You shuffle your feet to dislodge the surface beneath you or otherwise cause your opponent to become unsteady. Attempt an @Check[type:acrobatics|defense:reflex] check against the adjacent creature's Reflex saving throw DC. On a success, the creature falls. On a critical failure, you fall.
